    • removeOrgAsset

      public void removeOrgAsset​(int assetID, double amount, User user, java.lang.String operator)
      Remove an asset from an organization
      Parameters:
      assetID - the ID of the asset
      amount - the quantity to remove
      user - the user removing the asset
      operator - +, -, or = the sum of assets

    • removeCredits

      public void removeCredits​(double amount, User user, java.lang.String operator)

      amount - the amount to remove
      user - the user to remove credits from their organization
      operator - +, -, or = the sum of assets
